channel.title: A couple interfaces
channel.description:
So I was bored and I made a couple interfaces. Staff Control panel interface:
http://gyazo.com/3b472f4835c2c8e207dafd0788819832
This is just the interface, nothing has been done yet server sided, planning on adding it soon. Just thought that nobody had this so I would add it as a cool feature and easy access to punishing players, instead of using commands Players online interface:
http://gyazo.com/e8d36efab417d87f7dacb3612f936935
Made an interface for players online, not handled server sided yet either, just for the fun of it, and looks more clean than using the quest interface for listing the players online.

item.title: A couple interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I am not a fan of the disorganization in the panel the online is kind of tacky with the scroll button I believe hard to explain

Read full topic

item.title: A couple interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

don’t like the control panel at all, the players online thing is neat though.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:548142”][quote author=ReaperXScape link=topic=667046.msg4460496#msg4460496 date=1417318361]
yeah, I only have to change a loop, and there’s probably gonna be client updates every once in a while anyways. it holds 85 players on the list. I doubt my server will ever get passed 20
[/quote]
Again, my point being, is if you ever did go past that 85 players online, you’d have to send a new client out to everyone with that loop modified.[/quote]

or it could be sent from the server

Read full topic

item.title: A couple interfaces
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

ReaperXScape:

yeah, I only have to change a loop, and there’s probably gonna be client updates every once in a while anyways. it holds 85 players on the list. I doubt my server will ever get passed 20

Again, my point being, is if you ever did go past that 85 players online, you’d have to send a new client out to everyone with that loop modified.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple interfaces
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

yeah, I only have to change a loop, and there’s probably gonna be client updates every once in a while anyways. it holds 85 players on the list. I doubt my server will ever get passed 20

item.title: A couple interfaces
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The only staff member that really would benefit from a control panel would be an administrator or an owner, the moderators should be able to suffice with their commands.
Also your list looks like it only supports ~100 players… Another downside of making interfaces like this is that if you get a sudden boom in players, you’d have to update the client just to support them.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

Looks appealing for a server, doesn’t look over done. I want to do things like this.

Read full topic
